comments.content: More [DIN Neuzeit Grotesk Condensed Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20131102162444/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/din-neuzeit-grotesk/) to me.
Or just some instance of [Adobe Sans MM](http://web.archive.org/web/20131102162444/http:/www.identifont.com/show?8J8)?
DIN Neuzeit Grotesk Pro Bold Condensed is it. Thank you.
